Player History
Drafted in 2nd round, 27th overall pick, by Wisconsin in 1981...
Traded from Wisconsin to Pittsburgh on 1/31/1984 (Going to WIS: P L. Marx, RF A. Sinclair. Going to PIT: LF A. Rahim, 1B K. Garrett, 3B J. Hollingsworth, CF B. Perales)...
Injured on 5/3/1986 with a Inflamed Rib Cage Muscle, out for one week...
Had first career hit on 4/1/1988, off Rolland Williams (WT)...
Hit first career homerun on 4/5/1988, off Chet Byars (DIA)...
Won Player of the Week award on 4/28/1988, hitting .500 with 1 HR, 3 RBI...
